name: TheRev
0:
”Alexa, play rev radio”
”Alexa, play the rev radio”
”Alexa, rev radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rev radio
des: As a ministry outreach of Watersprings Church Idaho Falls, TheREV-FM is the premier Christian station of Southeast Idaho and Western Wyoming that the whole family can trust and enjoy. Our goal is to be a broadcasting conduit of positive change in our local communities and around the world by providing a life-changing and family-friendly music format, along with programming, wherein He can change hearts and lives toward following Him. This is made possible through our business underwriters and listener supporters who seek to glorify God. It’s here where we believe the Lord will build you up and strengthen you in His Music His Word.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
